Class ec.ui.InspectorEvent 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.Event
           |
           +----ec.ifc.app.ECEvent
                   |
                   +----ec.ui.InspectorEvent
public class InspectorEvent
extends ECEvent
We use an IFC event to call up the Inspector to inspect an objet with a given name since the IFC based Inspector must run in the IFC thread and the only way to accomplish this is to send it an IFC event.
